hints.content:
$\blueD{465}$ is the smallest whole number that rounds to $470$.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A vertical number line labeled 460 to 480 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 460, 465, 470, and 480 are labeled. The tick mark for 465 is blue. !

hints.content:
$\blueD{474}$ is the greatest whole number that rounds to $470$.

[[☃ image 1]]

So, any whole number from $\blueD{465}$ to $\blueD{474}$ rounds to $470$.

options.alt: A vertical number line labeled 460 to 480 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 460, 465, 470, 474, and 480 are labeled. The tick marks for 465 and 474 are blue. !

A vertical number line labeled 460 to 480 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 460, 465, 470, 474, and 480 are labeled. The tick marks for 465 and 474 are blue. A blue line runs along the number line from the tick mark at 465 to the tick mark at 474. !

question.content:
**Which number line highlights all whole numbers that round to $470$ if we are rounding to the nearest ten?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A vertical number line labeled 460 to 480 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 460, 465, 470, 474, and 480 are labeled. The tick marks for 465 and 474 are blue. A blue line runs along the number line from the tick mark at 465 to the tick mark at 474.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/dc1fc8559ef1813b74d7d7b43ccc42309493a1c0)

A blue line runs along the number line from the tick mark at 460 to the tick mark at 470.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b0bc192892b6507b18f3c4263f90967a38646f30)
